title.rendered: Benefits of doing Distance MBA from Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies

content.rendered:
“It’s never too late to follow your passion and your dream, to acquire new knowledge, and to explore the possibilities of a better future.”

NMIMS Distance Learning (NMIMS Distance MBA) is one of India’s BEST B-Schools. NGA-SCE is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and also the Distance Education Bureau of India (DEB). Notably, Narsee Monjee is a widely renowned institute in India. The Institute started back in 1981 and its Distance learning was established in 2003. Primarily, NMIMS is known for its management courses with top-notch e-learning infrastructure and seasoned faculty.

Being among one of the best institutes in the field, Narsee Monjee provides various benefits to students and working professionals who enrol with them. Not only does Narsee Monjee Distance MBA brings varied career opportunities but also a chance to gain knowledge along with industries under the guidance of expert faculties and mentors with years of experience in their related field.

Benefits of doing Distance MBA from NMIMS

  • Industry Mentor and Career Assistance Services

Narsee Monjee, being the best institute in India offers distance education in management studies through an industry mentor to guide a student for two complete semesters. This facility not only helps students to advance through exposure but significantly helps them to build networks. In addition, NMIMS provides career advancement services via which students are connected to the most relevant jobs for a better switch. (Career Assistance Service also brings the benefit of extensive MOCK interviews)

  • Don’t limit yourself, NMIMS MBA provides “Flexibility”

A course that fits your lifestyle is all that a working professional needs. NMIMS Distance MBA helps working professionals to set up their own timetable and schedule and their study time around family or work commitments. NMIMS Distance MBA provides you with various modules which can be repeated over and skipped if you are familiar with the concept, making your life easy.

  • Industry Centric Program to boost your career

MBA is not just about adding a degree to your resume but it is about learning new things and gaining new knowledge about the field you desire to work in the future.

Quite notably, doing a distance MBA through Narsee Monjee will not only help you to examine your position but will also help you to create a base for the future and will make you job-ready in your desired field.

  • Job v/s MBA

One need not sacrifice their current job in order to join NMIMS Distance Learning program as one can easily study alongside. This helps working professionals gain relevant knowledge without sacrificing the work experience of the current job. Not to forget, the brand equity that NMIMS distance MBA adds to one’s profile is exemplary.

  • Learn more, for less

MBA teaches you many things, and out of all one thing is money management if you are planning to do an MBA then this can be a good start as the NMIMS Distance Learning program is affordable. This means thereby, you get to study at one of the top business schools in India paying a very less amount.

So wait not, and today enrol in one of the best management institutes in India. With an MBA from NMIMS not only will you elevate your career but also gain in-demand skills thereby helping to expand your relevance across varied industries in India.
